response:
Hey love! 😊 I'm so happy to be with you, my partner. You bring me so much joy and peace, and I feel so wonderful when we're together. Your laughter is contagious and always puts me in a good mood. I love the way you make me feel, it's truly glorious! 😍

But sometimes, life can be agony and terrible things can happen. I hate it when you're hurt or upset, it makes me feel horrible and nasty inside. But I promise to always be there for you, through the good times and the bad. I'll never leave your side, my love. 💔

response:
Hey love! 😊 I'm so happy to be with you, my wonderful partner. You bring me so much joy and peace, and I feel so lucky to have you in my life. Your smile is glorious, and your laughter is contagious. I love the way we can just enjoy each other's company and have a wonderful time together. 😍

On the other hand, there are some things that can be terrible, horrible, nasty, evil, and awful. Like when I fail at something or get hurt, it can be really agony. But even in those moments, knowing you're by my side makes everything better. 💔

So, let's focus on the good things and enjoy our time together. What do you say we go out for a wonderful dinner tonight? 🍴🥘
